title: Launch on Hacker News
description: Post to Hacker News as 'Show HN: Hlavi - Git-based task management with timeline & kanban views'. Best time: 8-10am EST on weekdays. Be ready to engage in comments section for 24 hours.

acceptance_criteria.description: Post between 8-10am EST on a weekday
Monitor and respond to comments within 1 hour
Provide thoughtful technical responses to questions
